topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Alpha: Managing System Faults

body.p: You can examine and filter the alarms and logs generated by HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade in order to monitor and respond to fault conditions.
Note: This feature applies only to servers in regionone.

Using the Fault Management page on the Admin menu, you can access the following system records:
Active Alarms—Alarms that are currently set, and require user action to clear them. See Viewing System Alarms.
Historical Alarms—Alarms that have been raised in the past, including those that have been cleared. See Viewing System Alarms.
Customer Logs—Events that do not require user action, but may provide useful information for fault management. See Viewing Customer Logs.
For more information on alarms, see the HP Helion OpenStack 2.0 Carrier Grade: Administrator Guide.
